title: Honor Progression
body:
Hello, 
I am writing this to see if I am the only one not leveling up in honor.  Since the honor rework came out i remain at honor 2 with no apparent progression in honor.  The patch notes mentioned something about getting rewards for games but I have only gotten keys and it feels very lacking compared to when I used to get honor capsules.  I hope that somebody will be able to clarify for me the whole honor system and why I feel like I just can't level up no matter how much I get honored.
-MilkLL

replies.body:
The honor reset happened not too long ago, so it might just take a bit longer to progress this season. The goal for progressing is that you'd slowly progress throughout the entire season, so I don't think we should be expecting to see any honor rank 5's anytime soon. 

I checked your current honor progress, and it actually looks like you've been really honorable so you're getting "honor xp" at a faster rate than normal! You'll see checkpoints and rank ups before too long!

Dude:- when started this new honor season? If I'm not wrong- with 8'th season at 16'th january. Not even 2 weeks ago.

I don't know how many games you played & how much honor you gained, but if you wanted reach checkpoint in less than 2 weeks, when the reworked honor system in previous season started in July(?) & reaching 5'th level THEN was easy as... Very easy...

Now we have WHOLE season, it's January. Chill. I hope, that this honor system will be much "harder" & only the best & the nicest people will reach 5'th level...


If you now want at least checkpoint, then in ~April you will have 5'th level. & Then you will write things like "why there is no more honor levels?"...

I'm getting also only keys & I don't have a problem with that. Because for bigger prize now you must work harder & wait longer.
Yah I understand your point but the thing is I kinda no lifed to level 60 when the season started and have seen no honor growth.  I am happy to wait for the bigger rewards in the future though :D
